name: MechanicalComplicationsOfHipAndKneeProstheticDevices
title: Mechanical Complications of hip and knee prosthetic devices
description:
Used to identify patients with mechanical complications of hip and knee prosthetic devices

NOTE:  VALUE SET UNDER DEVELOPMENT AS MEASURE TESTING IS ONGOING.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes that identify patients with mechanical complications of hip and knee prosthetic devices),(Data Element Scope: This value set is developed for the diagnosis QDM datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include all diagnosis codes associated with mechanical complications of hip and knee prosthetic devices),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes complications unrelated to prosthetic device (wound infection, bleeding).)

concept.display: Infection of prosthesis of right hip (disorder)
Loosening of acetabular cup of total hip replacement (disorder)
Loosening of femoral stem of total hip replacement (disorder)
Loosening of femoral component of total knee replacement (disorder)
Loosening of tibial component of total knee replacement (disorder)
Pain due to hip joint prosthesis (disorder)
Pain due to knee joint prosthesis (disorder)
Recurrent dislocation of hip joint prosthesis (disorder)
Infection of total knee joint prosthesis (disorder)
Infection of unicondylar knee joint prosthesis (disorder)
Infection of total hip joint prosthesis (disorder)

Loosening of acetabular cup of total hip replacement (disorder)
